channel.title: Android phone in USB tethering mode
channel.description: Hallo, to connect myself to internet I use an android phone in thetering USB mode (no debugging USB active). It acts like a modem/router, basically (it's in USB thetering mode) I was wondering if it could be a security problem/possible ip leaks using whonix combined with this type of connection. Thanks.

item.title: Android phone in USB tethering mode
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

No, by design, IP-Leaks aren’t possible, no matter what the connection is.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Android phone in USB tethering mode
